verses.verse: Moreover <S%H1732>David<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> <S%H914>separated<s%> to the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> and of <S%H1968>Heman,<s%> and of <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> who should <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> with <S%H3658>harps,<s%> with <S%H5035>psalteries,<s%> and with <S%H4700>cymbals:<s%> and the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H582>workmen<s%> <S%H4399><s%> according to their <S%H5656>service<s%> was:

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph;<s%> <S%H2139>Zaccur,<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> and <S%H841>Asarelah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%> <S%H5921>under<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> which <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H3027>order<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

Of <S%H3038>Jeduthun:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun;<s%> <S%H1436>Gedaliah,<s%> and <S%H6874>Zeri,<s%> and <S%H3470>Jeshaiah,<s%> <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> and <S%H4993>Mattithiah,<s%> <S%H8337>six,<s%> <S%H5921>under<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of their <S%H25>father<s%> <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> with a <S%H3658>harp,<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> and to <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Of <S%H1968>Heman:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1968>Heman:<s%> <S%H1232>Bukkiah,<s%> <S%H4983>Mattaniah,<s%> <S%H5816>Uzziel,<s%> <S%H7619>Shebuel,<s%> and <S%H3406>Jerimoth,<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> <S%H2607>Hanani,<s%> <S%H448>Eliathah,<s%> <S%H1437>Giddalti,<s%> and <S%H7320>Romamtiezer,<s%> <S%H3436>Joshbekashah,<s%> <S%H4413>Mallothi,<s%> <S%H1956>Hothir,<s%> and <S%H4238>Mahazioth:<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1968>Heman<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H2374>seer<s%> in the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H7311>lift<s%> up the <S%H7161>horn.<s%> And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H1968>Heman<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6246><s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were <S%H5921>under<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of their <S%H25>father<s%> for <S%H7892>song<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> with <S%H4700>cymbals,<s%> <S%H5035>psalteries,<s%> and <S%H3658>harps,<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H3027>order<s%> to <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> and <S%H1968>Heman.<s%>

So the <S%H4557>number<s%> of them, with their <S%H251>brothers<s%> that were <S%H3925>instructed<s%> in the <S%H7892>songs<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> that were <S%H995>cunning,<s%> was two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> and <S%H8083>eight.<s%>

And they <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots,<s%> <S%H4931>ward<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> <S%H4931>ward,<s%> as well the <S%H6996>small<s%> as the <S%H1419>great,<s%> the <S%H995>teacher<s%> as the <S%H8527>scholar.<s%>

Now the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> for <S%H623>Asaph<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph:<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> with his <S%H251>brothers<s%> and <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H7992>third<s%> to <S%H2139>Zaccur,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H7243>fourth<s%> to <S%H3339>Izri,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H2549>fifth<s%> to <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H8345>sixth<s%> to <S%H1232>Bukkiah,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H7637>seventh<s%> to <S%H3480>Jesharelah,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H8066>eighth<s%> to <S%H3470>Jeshaiah,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H8671>ninth<s%> to <S%H4983>Mattaniah,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H6224>tenth<s%> to <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H6240>eleventh<s%> to <S%H5832>Azareel,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H7619>Shubael,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H4993>Mattithiah,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H3406>Jeremoth,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H8337>sixteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H7651>seventeenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H3436>Joshbekashah,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H6240>eighteenth<s%> to <S%H2607>Hanani,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H8672>nineteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H4413>Mallothi,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> to <S%H448>Eliathah,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H259>one<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> to <S%H1956>Hothir,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> to <S%H1437>Giddalti,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H7969>three<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> to <S%H4238>Mahazioth,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>
The <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> to <S%H7320>Romamtiezer,<s%> he, his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve.<s%> <S%H6240><s%>
